subject: Football
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Joe McKnight rushed for a game-high 25 yards on 9 carries, including a 3-yard touchdown run, in the West team’s 24-7 victory in the U.S. Army All-American Bowl, an all-star game for high school seniors.
